statements: SELECT neighborhood_name, number_of_listings FROM CompetitionAnalysis;
SELECT number_of_listings, neighborhood_name FROM CompetitionAnalysis;
SELECT neighborhood_name FROM CompetitionAnalysis WHERE number_of_listings > 10;
SELECT * FROM CompetitionAnalysis WHERE neighborhood_name LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CompetitionAnalysis;
SELECT neighborhood_name, number_of_listings FROM CompetitionAnalysis WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown'
SELECT neighborhood_name, number_of_listings FROM CompetitionAnalysis WHERE number_of_listings > 10 ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC
SELECT neighborhood_name, SUM(number_of_listings) AS total_listings FROM CompetitionAnalysis GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING total_listings > 50
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) AS total_listings FROM CompetitionAnalysis GROUP BY neighborhood_name ORDER BY total_listings DESC
SELECT neighborhood_name, AVG(number_of_listings) AS avg_listings_per_neighborhood FROM CompetitionAnalysis GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING avg_listings_per_neighborhood < 15
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, listings_count FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC;
SELECT listing_id, listing_price FROM listings WHERE listing_price > 1000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, listing_type FROM neighborhoods INNER JOIN listings ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = listings.neighborhood_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_listings FROM listings;
SELECT neighborhood_name, listings_count FROM neighborhoods WHERE listings_count > 100 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;

SELECT listings.listing_id, neighborhoods.neighborhood_name, listings.listing_price FROM listings JOIN neighborhoods ON listings.neighborhood_id = neighborhoods.neighborhood_id WHERE listings.listing_price > 5000 ORDER BY listings.listing_price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, COUNT(listing_id) AS total_listings FROM listings GROUP BY neighborhood_id HAVING total_listings >= 5 ORDER BY total_listings DESC;

SELECT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name, MAX(listing_price) AS max_price FROM listings JOIN neighborhoods ON listings.neighborhood_id = neighborhoods.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_id ORDER BY max_price DESC;

SELECT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name, AVG(listing_price) AS avg_price FROM listings JOIN neighborhoods ON listings.neighborhood_id = neighborhoods.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_id HAVING AVG(listing_price) >= 3000 ORDER BY avg_price;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_listings
SELECT listing_name, listing_price FROM neighborhood_listings WHERE neighborhood_id = 1
SELECT listing_name FROM neighborhood_listings WHERE listing_price > 1000
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods JOIN cities ON neighborhoods.city = cities.city_name
SELECT n.neighborhood_name, c.city_name FROM neighborhoods n JOIN cities c ON n.city = c.city_name
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_listings
SELECT listing_name, listing_price FROM neighborhood_listings WHERE neighborhood_id = 1
SELECT listing_name, listing_price FROM neighborhood_listings ORDER BY listing_price DESC
SELECT neighborhood_name, city FROM neighborhoods JOIN cities ON neighborhoods.city = cities.city_name
SELECT city_name, state FROM cities
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT listing_id, listing_name FROM Listings WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name FROM Competitors ORDER BY competitor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ListingTracking WHERE tracking_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) AS listing_count FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Listings ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Listings.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_name;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods
SELECT listing_name, neighborhood_name FROM Listings INNER JOIN Neighborhoods ON Listings.neighborhood_id = Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id
SELECT competitor_name, listing_count FROM Competitors LEFT JOIN ListingTracking ON Competitors.competitor_id = ListingTracking.competitor_id
SELECT neighborhood_id, MAX(listing_count) AS max_count FROM Listings INNER JOIN ListingTracking ON Listings.listing_id = ListingTracking.listing_id GROUP BY neighborhood_id
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_data;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood_data ORDER BY neighborhood_name;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood_data WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood_data WHERE neighborhood_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT MAX(neighborhood_id) AS max_neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood_data;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_data;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood_data ORDER BY neighborhood_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(listing_price) AS max_price, MIN(listing_price) AS min_price FROM listing_data WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT competitor_name, neighborhood_name FROM competitor_data INNER JOIN neighborhood_data ON competitor_data.neighborhood_id = neighborhood_data.neighborhood_id;
SELECT neighborhood_name, avg(trend_value) AS avg_trend_value FROM trend_data GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING avg(trend_value) > 1000;
